[
    If {
        condition: Parenthesized {
            left_parenthesis: Span(
                1,
                9,
            ),
            inner: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            10,
                        ),
                        name: "foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            right_parenthesis: Span(
                1,
                14,
            ),
        },
        then: [
            Return {
                value: Some(
                    Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    1,
                                    23,
                                ),
                                name: "foo",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                ),
            },
        ],
        else_ifs: [],
        else: None,
    },
]
